alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Orange; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL FAIRFIELD... NORTHERN WESTCHESTER...NORTHEASTERN ORANGE AND PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM EDT... At 415 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Brewster to Peekskill. Movement was northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danbury, Newburgh, Peekskill, Mahopac, Lake Carmel, West Point, Sherman, Brewster, Cold Spring, New Windsor, Ridgefield, New Fairfield, Carmel, Gardnertown, and Yorktown Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
